text: The Myrtales are an order of flowering plants. They are a basal group of dicotyledons. == Families == * Family Alzateaceae * Family Combretaceae (leadwood family) * Family Crypteroniaceae * Family Heteropyxidaceae * Family Lythraceae (loosestrife and pomegranate family) * Family Melastomataceae * Family Memecylaceae * Family Myrtaceae (myrtle family) * Family Oliniaceae * Family Onagraceae (evening primrose family) * Family Penaeaceae * Family Psiloxylaceae * Family Rhynchocalycaceae * Family Vochysiaceae
title: Myrtales
